title: Smoke screen
creator_credit: Mimi Warshaw, Michael Warshaw and Rainy Day Productions
brief_description: An anti-smoking film, without commentary, which begins with kinestatic, fast-moving stills displaying forty years of cigarette advertising, then moves through a collage of superimposed images of smokers, cancer patients, slogans, tissue slides and surgical flashes.
creator_credit_for_label: Mimi Warshaw, Michael Warshaw and Rainy Day Productions
